publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1583 Mr John Swinney: Powers of the Scottish Parliamentâ€”That the Parliament notes that the majority of Scots believe the Scottish Parliament should have increased powers; calls for dialogue amongst political parties within the Parliament about securing additional powers, particularly in relation to fiscal autonomy, and recognises that a normal independent parliament would be able to use the resources of Scotland to address the social and economic priorities determined by the people of Scotland. Supported by: Michael Matheson*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Andrew Wilson*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Tricia Marwick*, Kay Ullrich*
S1M-1583 Mr John Swinney: Powers of the Scottish Parliament - Withdrawn
